parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server=coderfoundry.cloudapp.net,55555; Database=rchapman-shoppingapp; User ID=ryanchapman24; Password=chappy24; Persist Security Info=True; Connection Timeout=30; TrustServerCertificate=True;
